domain.name: Politician

text:
@realDonaldTrump Do gunboats fly too?
Immigration ban didn’t quite eliminate your abject failure of leadership with 
COVID19 which you ignored and created a genocide?  So, now you think that shooting ‘boats’ that Iranians ‘fly’  and provoking a conflict as 
distraction is a good move?
Conman!
